Articles.Content: KSP is working with 32bit and so it'll only be able to have about 2 GB Ram while my computer has 8 GB and has an amazing graphics card. That's not enough, You should release a KSP version for 64bit so I eve and back ships which don't lag the game to death.
While this would be great as we would all be able to build massive rockets, it is on the What not to suggest list, and has come up numerous times.

As mentioned it's on the do-not-suggest list; it's on the list because it's not something Squad can solve, it's a limitation of the game's engine. I gather the Unity guys are scrambling hard to get a 64-bit version stable for Windows & Mac, but until then we're stuck with 32-bit KSP.

(Well, that is unless you're running the right Linux version. Apparently there's a stable 64-bit build there... but that's not enough to get me to switch OSes.)

-- Steve
